# SkeletalPose

**Structure**

A container that holds the position and orientation of each joint in a single animation skeleton.

## Declaration

```swift
struct SkeletalPose
```

## Overview

Each index in [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SkeletalPose/jointNames] directly corresponds to the same index in [doc://com.apple.RealityKit/documentation/RealityKit/SkeletalPose/jointTransforms], linking each joint name to its respective transform.

## Initializers

- **init(id:from:)**: Creates a skeletal pose from the rest pose of the model skeleton.
- **init(id:joints:)**: Creates a pose for the joint name and transformation pairs.

## Instance Properties

- **id**: The unique identifier of the pose.
- **jointNames**: The names of the joints in the pose in specific order.
- **jointTransforms**: The transformations of the joints in the pose.

## Subscripts

- **subscript(_:)**: Accesses a pose transformation using the index of the joint name.

## Skeletons

- **SkeletalPosesComponent**: A component that exposes the collection of named animation skeletal poses.
- **SkeletalPoseSet**: A collection of named skeletal poses.

## Conforms To

- Identifiable
